00037 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 // Constructor: uvm_schedule
00039 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040 uvm_schedule::uvm_schedule(sc_module_name name) :
00041     sc_module(name),
00042     _top_phase(NULL),
00043     _next_phase(NULL),
00044     _current_phase(NULL),
00045     _bcontinue(true),
00046     _bsim_start(false),
00047     _name(name)
00048 
00049 {
00050 }

00052 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 // Destructor: uvm_schedule
00054 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00055 uvm_schedule::~uvm_schedule()
00056 {
00057     std::map<std::string, uvm_phase*>::iterator it;
00058 
00059     for (it = _phase_map.begin(); it != _phase_map.end(); it++)
00060     {
00061         if (it->second != NULL)
00062             delete it->second;
00063     }
00064     _phase_map.clear();
00065 }

00069 string uvm_schedule::get_name()
00070 {
00071     return _name;
00072 }

00075 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00076 // Function: set_top_phase
00077 //   Set the starting phase for this schedule
00078 //
00079 // Parameters:
00080 //   name - name of top phase
00081 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 void uvm_schedule::set_top_phase(string name)
00083 {
00084     std::ostringstream   outmsg;
00085 
00086     _top_phase = _phase_map[name];
00087     _current_phase = _top_phase;
00088 
00089     if (_top_phase == NULL)
00090     {
00091         outmsg << name << endl;
00092         SC_REPORT_FATAL(UVM_PHASE_UNKNOWN, outmsg.str().c_str());
00093     }
00094 }

00106     return true;  // FIXME

00155 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00156 // Function: add_phase
00157 //   Add a phase to the schedule and returns the phase pointer.
00158 //
00159 // Parameters:
00160 //  name - name of phase to add
00161 //
00162 // Returns:
00163 //   phase - pointer to phase
00164 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00165 uvm_phase* uvm_schedule::add_phase(string name, uvm_phase_type type, uvm_phase_order order)
00166 {
00167     uvm_phase* phase;
00168 
00169     phase = new uvm_phase(name, this, type, order);
00170     _phase_map[name] = phase;
00171 
00172     return phase;
00173 }

00180 //  phase - phase to be added
00181 //
00182 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00183 void uvm_schedule::add_phase(uvm_phase* pphase)

00188 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00189 // Function: add_arc
00190 //   Add an arc
00191 //
00192 // Parameters:
00193 //  from_phase - name of phase arc starts from
00194 //  to_phase   - name of phase arc goes to
00195 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00196 void uvm_schedule::add_arc(string from_phase, string to_phase, unsigned int priority)
00197 {
00198     std::ostringstream   outmsg;
00199     uvm_phase* pfrom_phase = _phase_map[from_phase];
00200     uvm_phase* pto_phase   = _phase_map[to_phase];
00201     
00202     if (pfrom_phase == NULL)
00203     {
00204         outmsg << from_phase << endl;
00205         SC_REPORT_FATAL(UVM_PHASE_UNKNOWN, outmsg.str().c_str());
00206     }
00207     else if (pto_phase == NULL)
00208     {
00209         outmsg << to_phase << endl;
00210         SC_REPORT_FATAL(UVM_PHASE_UNKNOWN, outmsg.str().c_str());
00211     }
00212     else
00213         pfrom_phase->add_next_phase(pto_phase, priority);
00214 
00215 
00216 }
00217 
00218 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00219 // Function: add_arc
00220 //   Add an arc
00221 //
00222 // Parameters:
00223 //  from_phase - pointer of phase arc starts from
00224 //  to_phase   - pointer of phase arc goes to
00225 //
00226 // Returns:
00227 //  status - return false if either phase pointer does not exists in the pool
00228 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00229 void uvm_schedule::add_arc(uvm_phase* pfrom_phase, uvm_phase* pto_phase, unsigned int priority)
00230 {
00231     add_arc(pfrom_phase->get_name(), pto_phase->get_name(), priority);
00232 }

00237 //
00238 // Parameters:

00240 //
00241 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00242 void uvm_schedule::go_to_phase(string name)
00243 {
00244     std::ostringstream   outmsg;
00245     uvm_phase* pphase = _phase_map[name];
00246 
00247     if (pphase == NULL)
00248     {
00249         outmsg << name << endl;
00250         SC_REPORT_FATAL(UVM_PHASE_UNKNOWN, outmsg.str().c_str());
00251     }
00252     else
00253     {
00254         _current_phase->go_to_phase(pphase);
00255     }
00256 
00257 }

00288 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00289 // Function: do_run()
00290 //    Executes all the runtime phases of this schedule
00291 //    This method is typically spawned from the phase controller
00292 //
00293 // Parameters:
00294 //  none
00295 //
00296 // Returns:
00297 //  none
00298 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00299 void uvm_schedule::do_run()
00300 {
00301     if (_current_phase == NULL)
00302     {
00303         SC_REPORT_WARNING(UVM_PHASE_NULL,"");
00304         return;
00305     }
00306 
00307     while ((_current_phase != NULL) && (_current_phase->get_phase_type() == UVM_RUNTIME_PHASE))
00308     {
00309         execute_runtime_phase();
00310         update_phase_state();
00311     }
00312 }
00313 
00314 
00315 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00316 // Function: update_phase_state
00317 //   Move phase to the next state 
00318 //
00319 // TODO - This should method be moved inside the phase object
00320 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00321 
00322 uvm::uvm_phase_state uvm_schedule::update_phase_state()
00323 {
00324     uvm_phase_state phase_state = _current_phase->get_phase_state();
00325     uvm_phase_state next_state  = UVM_PHASE_DORMANT;
00326 
00327     switch(phase_state)
00328     {
00329     case UVM_PHASE_DORMANT:
00330         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_STARTED);
00331         next_state = UVM_PHASE_STARTED;
00332         break;
00333 
00334     case UVM_PHASE_STARTED:
00335         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING);
00336         next_state = UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING;
00337         break;
00338 
00339     case UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING:
00340         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END);
00341         next_state = UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END;
00342         break;
00343 
00344     case UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END:
00345         _current_phase->set_phase_state(UVM_PHASE_ENDED);
00346         next_state = UVM_PHASE_ENDED;
00347         break;
00348 
00349     case UVM_PHASE_ENDED:
00350         _current_phase->reset_phase();                      // reset phase in case it is re-entered
00351         _current_phase = _current_phase->get_next_phase();  // move to next scheduled phase
00352         next_state = UVM_PHASE_DONE;                        // indicate phase has completed 
00353         break;
00354 
00355     case UVM_PHASE_DONE:
00356         // Note:  This case will never be reached by the standalone phase controller - do nothing
00357         break;
00358 
00359     default:
00360         SC_REPORT_FATAL(UVM_PHASE_STATE_INVALID,"");
00361         break;
00362     };
00363 
00364     return next_state;
00365 }
00366 
00367 
00368 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00369 // Function: execute_nonruntime_phase
00370 //   Main execution for non-runtime phases
00371 //
00372 // TODO - This should method be moved inside the phase object
00373 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00374 void uvm_schedule::execute_nonruntime_phase(sc_core::sc_module *pmod)
00375 {
00376     uvm_phase_state phase_state = _current_phase->get_phase_state();
00377 
00378     switch(phase_state)
00379     {
00380     case UVM_PHASE_DORMANT:
00381         break;
00382 
00383     case UVM_PHASE_STARTED:
00384         _current_phase->execute_nonruntime_phase(pmod);
00385         break;
00386 
00387     case UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING:
00388         _current_phase->execute_nonruntime_phase(pmod);
00389         break;
00390 
00391     case UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END:
00392         // Note:  For pre-/post-run phases, there is nothing to do here
00393         //        Callbacks are not called for 'READY_TO_END' in pre/post
00394         break;
00395 
00396     case UVM_PHASE_ENDED:
00397         _current_phase->execute_nonruntime_phase(pmod);
00398         break;
00399 
00400     default:
00401         SC_REPORT_FATAL(UVM_PHASE_STATE_INVALID,"");
00402         break;
00403     };
00404 }
00405 
00406 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00407 // Function: execute_runtime_phase
00408 //   Main execution for runtime phases
00409 //
00410 // TODO - This should method be moved inside the phase object
00411 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00412 void uvm_schedule::execute_runtime_phase()
00413 {
00414     bool bready;
00415     sc_process_handle barrier_h;
00416     uvm_phase_state phase_state = _current_phase->get_phase_state();
00417     sc_time dur(5, SC_NS);
00418 
00419     switch(phase_state)
00420     {
00421     case UVM_PHASE_DORMANT:
00422         break;
00423 
00424     case UVM_PHASE_STARTED:
00425         bready = _current_phase->is_sync_point_ready(UVM_SYNC_AT_START);
00426         if (!bready)
00427             _current_phase->wait_started();
00428         _current_phase->execute_runtime_phase();
00429         break;
00430 
00431     case UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING:
00432         _current_phase->execute_runtime_phase();
00433         barrier_h = sc_spawn(sc_bind(&uvm_schedule::wait_barrier, this));
00434         wait(barrier_h.terminated_event());
00435         bready = _current_phase->is_sync_point_ready(UVM_SYNC_AT_END);
00436         if (!bready)
00437             _current_phase->wait_ready_to_end();
00438         break;
00439 
00440     case UVM_PHASE_READY_TO_END:
00441         _current_phase->execute_runtime_phase();
00442         break;
00443 
00444     case UVM_PHASE_ENDED:
00445         _current_phase->execute_runtime_phase();
00446         break;
00447 
00448     default:
00449         break;
00450     };
00451 }
00452

00454 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00455 // Function: wait_barrier
00456 //   Wait for barrier to be cleared
00457 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00458 void uvm_schedule::wait_barrier(void)
00459 {
00460     // TODO - Do we need to wait() to allow all spawned threads to run?
00461     _current_phase->barrier.wait();
00462 }

00484 //   Start of simulation call back from SystemC

00487 {
00488     _bsim_start = true;
00489     _sim_start_ev.notify();
00490 }

00492 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00493 // Function: register_callback
00494 //   Register component to all phases in schedule
00495 //
00496 // Parameter:
00497 //   pcomp - ptr to component
00498 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00499 void uvm_schedule::register_callback(uvm_component* pcomp)
00500 {
00501     std::map<string, uvm_phase*>::iterator it;
00502 
00503     for (it = _phase_map.begin(); it != _phase_map.end(); it++)
00504     {
00505         it->second->register_comp_callback(pcomp);
00506     }
00507 }

00509 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00510 // Function: set_phase
00511 // 
00512 // Usage:  Called from external phase controller only to set the current phase
00513 //
00514 // Parameter: phase name / phase state
00515 // Return:    pPhase if successful, NULL if no phase found or unsuccessful
00516 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00517 uvm_phase * uvm_schedule::set_phase(string phase_name, uvm_phase_state state)
00518 {
00519     uvm_phase *pphase = _phase_map[phase_name]; 
00520 
00521     if (pphase == NULL)
00522         return NULL;
00523 
00524     _current_phase = pphase;
00525     return ((_current_phase->do_state(state) == 1) ? _current_phase : NULL);
00526 }
00527 
00528 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00529 // Function: execute_quasi_static_phase
00530 //   
00531 //
00532 // Parameter:
00533 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00534 int uvm_schedule::execute_quasi_static_phase(string phase_name, uvm_phase_state state)
00535 {
00536     uvm_phase *pphase = _phase_map[phase_name]; 
00537     static bool bresolve_bindings = false;
00538 
00539 
00540     if ( (phase_name.compare("resolve_bindings") == 0) &&
00541          (state == UVM_PHASE_EXECUTING)  &&
00542          (bresolve_bindings == false) )
00543     {
00544         bresolve_bindings = true;
00545         QUASI_STATIC_COMPLETE_BINDING();
00546         return 1;
00547     }
00548 
00549     if (pphase == NULL)
00550     {
00551         return 1; // It's legitimate to receive notification about the unknown phase
00552     }
00553 
00554     _current_phase = pphase;
00555     _current_phase->set_phase_state(state);
00556 
00557     if (state == uvm::UVM_PHASE_STARTED)
00558         return _current_phase->start();
00559     else if (state == uvm::UVM_PHASE_ENDED)
00560         return _current_phase->end();
00561     else    
00562         return 1;
00563 }
